quote: [Everyone needs] a woman who'll listen, take your side, tell the truth - or not, as you need it. A woman you can count on, no matter what, and who'll love you no matter how much you screw up.
quote_letters: EVERYONE NEEDS A WOMAN WHOLL LISTEN TAKE YOUR SIDE TELL THE TRUTH - OR NOT AS YOU NEED IT A WOMAN YOU CAN COUNT ON NO MATTER WHAT AND WHOLL LOVE YOU NO MATTER HOW MUCH YOU SCREW UP
